comment: /**  * A utility method to analyze the exceptions and collect the clauses  *  * @param e  the root exception (Throwable) object  * @param causes  the list of exceptions that caused the root exceptions  * @return  a list of Throwable  */
code: /**  * A utility method to analyze the exceptions and collect the clauses  *  * @param e  the root exception (Throwable) object  * @param causes  the list of exceptions that caused the root exceptions  * @return  a list of Throwable  */ public static List<Throwable> getExceptionCauses(Throwable e, List<Throwable> causes) {     if (e.getCause() == null) {         return causes.     } else {         causes.add(e.getCause()).         getExceptionCauses(e.getCause(), causes).     }     return causes. }
